gobblin.metrics.kafka

Class KafkaAvroEventReporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codahale.metrics.ScheduledReporter
      • gobblin.metrics.reporter.EventReporter
        • gobblin.metrics.kafka.KafkaEventReporter
          • gobblin.metrics.kafka.KafkaAvroEventReporter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.codahale.metrics.Reporter, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class KafkaAvroEventReporter
extends KafkaEventReporter
    EventReporter that emits events to Kafka as serialized Avro records.
